project_descr: Projects under Darfur Development Strategy, Foundational and Short-Term Activities (FAST) to create solid ground and a strong foundation for recovery and development in Darfur.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening Land Management for Peaceful Co-Existence in Darfur to address the issue of land in Darfur, which constitutes a considerable challenge to the Darfur peace initiatives and paves the way for sustainable recovery and reconstruction.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Microfinance for Young and Poor Producers in Rural Areas in Darfur to establish a Microfinance system in Darfur in order to provide the required funding for income generating activities to individuals and groups.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Accelerated Learning Programme (ALP), including life-skills and Improved Access to Employment Opportunities for out-of-school Children and Youth
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: The main output of the project is to install Solar Photovoltaic (SPV) systems in different community services centers (provide solar systems for schools, health clinics, streets, police stations, women centers and water pumping).
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Darfur Community Based Reintegration and Stabilization Programme (DDR & Small Arms Control Programme)
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Promotion of Sustainable Return and Reintegration of IDPs and Refugees in Darfur.The Project is a joint programme implemented by UNDP, UNHCR and UNAMID. In addition, the Project is closely coordinated with IOM and WHO
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: Promote Reconciliation and Coexistence for Sustainable Peace in Darfur (PRCSP) project aims to address reconciliation at multiple levels, with an emphasis on vulnerable groups (women, children and minorities amongst others).
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
